item.title: Ubuntu Budgie 23.10 Released!
item.dc:creator: David
item.description: We are pleased to announce the release of the next version of our distro, the 23.10 release. This is a standard release supported for 9 months packed full of all sorts of new capabilities. If you want a well tested and longer term support then our 22.04 LTS version is supported for 3 years. The […]
item.content:encoded:
We are pleased to announce the release of the next version of our distro, the 23.10 release. This is a standard release supported for 9 months packed full of all sorts of new capabilities. If you want a well tested and longer term support then our 22.04 LTS version is supported for 3 years. The new release has many new core updates as well as v10.8 version of budgie itself: We…

item.title: Ubuntu Budgie 22.04.03 Released!
item.dc:creator: David
item.description: We are pleased to announce the release of the next version of our distro, the third 22.04 LTS point release. The LTS version is supported for 3 years while the regular releases are supported for 9 months. The new release rolls-up various fixes and optimizations by Ubuntu Budgie team, that have been released since the […]
item.content:encoded:
We are pleased to announce the release of the next version of our distro, the third 22.04 LTS point release. The LTS version is supported for 3 years while the regular releases are supported for 9 months. The new release rolls-up various fixes and optimizations by Ubuntu Budgie team, that have been released since the 22.04.2 release in February: We also inherit hundreds of stability…

If you want a well tested and longer term support then our 22.04.2 LTS version is supported for 3 years. New with this release is a full backport of all the…

item.title: Ubuntu Budgie 22.10 Release Notes
item.dc:creator: David
item.description: Introduction and overview Ubuntu Budgie 22.10 (Kinetic Kudu) is a normal release with 9 months of support, from October 2022 to July 2023. Ubuntu LTS releases are focused on long term support. If stability is more important than having the latest and greatest version of the kernel, desktop environment, and applications then Ubuntu Budgie 22.04 […]
item.content:encoded:
Ubuntu Budgie 22.10 (Kinetic Kudu) is a normal release with 9 months of support, from October 2022 to July 2023. Ubuntu LTS releases are focused on long term support. If stability is more important than having the latest and greatest version of the kernel, desktop environment, and applications then Ubuntu Budgie 22.04 LTS is perfect for you. In these release notes, we are going to cover the…

Source

item.title: CoreCtrl repository changes
item.dc:creator: Mauro
item.description: Premise We recently introduced our Ubuntu Budgie Welcome Gaming app. It is an easy way for Ubuntu Budgie users to install useful games, gaming clients and tools. One of the tools included is CoreCtrl. CoreCtrl is a software that allows us to control hardware via application profiles. You can learn more about CoreCtrl on its […]
item.content:encoded:
We recently introduced our Ubuntu Budgie Welcome Gaming app. It is an easy way for Ubuntu Budgie users to install useful games, gaming clients and tools. One of the tools included is CoreCtrl. CoreCtrl is a software that allows us to control hardware via application profiles. You can learn more about CoreCtrl on its gitlab page. CoreCtrl is available for Ubuntu via mesarc PPA.

Source

item.title: Ubuntu Budgie 20.04.5 LTS Released!
item.dc:creator: David
item.description: We are pleased to announce the release of the next version of our distro, the fifth 20.04 LTS point release. The LTS version is supported for 3 years while the regular releases are supported for 9 months. This is our final point release for 20.04. Everyone is encouraged to make plans to uplift to 22.04 […]
item.content:encoded:
We are pleased to announce the release of the next version of our distro, the fifth 20.04 LTS point release. The LTS version is supported for 3 years while the regular releases are supported for 9 months. This is our final point release for 20.04. Everyone is encouraged to make plans to uplift to 22.04 between now and April 2023 when end-of-support will be announced The new release…

item.title: Ubuntu 22.04 Release Notes for 20.04 upgraders
item.dc:creator: Mauro
item.description: Introduction and overview Ubuntu Budgie 22.04 LTS (Jammy Jellyfish) is a Long Term Support release with 3 years of support, from April 2022 to April 2025. This is the 20.04 upgraders release note. This takes the 20.10/21.04 and 21.10 release notes and highlights the key parts that 20.04 upgraders need to be aware of. If […]
item.content:encoded:
Ubuntu Budgie 22.04 LTS (Jammy Jellyfish) is a Long Term Support release with 3 years of support, from April 2022 to April 2025. This is the 20.04 upgraders release note. This takes the 20.10/21.04 and 21.10 release notes and highlights the key parts that 20.04 upgraders need to be aware of. If you are upgrading from 21.10 we have a release note more applicable to you! In these release notes…

Source

item.title: Ubuntu Budgie 22.04 LTS Release Notes
item.dc:creator: Mauro
item.description: Introduction and overview Ubuntu Budgie 22.04 LTS (Jammy Jellyfish) is a Long Term Support release with 3 years of support, from April 2022 to April 2025. Ubuntu LTS releases are focused on long term support, therefore stability is more important than having latest and greatest version of kernel, desktop environment, and applications. In these release […]
item.content:encoded:
Ubuntu Budgie 22.04 LTS (Jammy Jellyfish) is a Long Term Support release with 3 years of support, from April 2022 to April 2025. Ubuntu LTS releases are focused on long term support, therefore stability is more important than having latest and greatest version of kernel, desktop environment, and applications. In these release notes, we are going to cover the following items: If you are…
